title: Marian Apparitions of the 20th Century (2000) - DVDRip - XviD
description:
Deeply rooted in humanity's history, the Blessed Virgin Mary has been making repeated visitations throughout the world, particularly in the latter part of the 20th Century, to warn mankind of the impending danger and to call humanity back to God before it is too late. 

Discover in this award-winning documentary some of the most fascinating apparitions of the 20th Century. Learn why God is sending the Blessed Mother with such frequency and what an unprecedented number of appearances portend for the future.

Witness for yourself rare and amazing footage and above all be transformed by the urgent message Heaven is revealing to the world. 

Documented in this film are reported apparitions from:

 - Fatima, Portugal
 - Akita, Japan
 - Zeitun, Egypt
 - Banneux, Belgium
 - Beauraing, Belgium
 - Medjugorje, Yugoslavia
 - Kibeho, Rwanda
 - Garabandal, Spain
 - The Soviet Ukraine
 - Betania, Venezuela
 - Naju, Korea

Language         : English
